content: this hobo handbag was crocheted using recycled plastic bags it is a pattern that i adapted from dao over at shortylamcrochet 1 **materials needed for project ** * 1 set of 1 inch d rings or circle rings * 2 yards of ribbon 1/2″-3/4″ will work * magnetic clasp closure * material for lining if desired 1 http //www myrecycledbags com/2008/05/16/recycled-plastic-hobo-handbag/
